casebody.data:
ELI GLOBAL, LLC, et al.
v.
HEAVNER 12PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2017 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Kendal B. Reed, Attorney at Law, for Eli Global, LLC, et al. James H. Hughes, Attorney at Law, Richard M. Hutson, II, Attorney at Law, Durham, Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney at Law, Hampton Y. Dellinger, Attorney at Law, for Heavner, James A. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, Mark J. Prak, Attorney at Law, Timothy Nelson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Association of Broadcasters, et al. Stuart M. Paynter, Attorney at Law, Celeste H. G. Boyd, Attorney at Law, Hillsborough, for Chapel Hill-Carrboro Chamber of Commerce.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of June 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2017."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 19th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
